original_text: And this came to the knowledge of Mordecai, and he told it to Queen Esther, and Esther told the king in the name of Mordecai.
korean_text: 모르드개가 알고 왕후 에스더에게 알리니 에스더가 모르드개의 이름으로 왕에게 아뢴지라

sentences.original_text: And this came to the knowledge of Mordecai
and he told it to Queen Esther
and Esther told the king in the name of Mordecai.
